subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: After tying the game with less than two minutes left in regulation, the Rangers won in overtime by a familiar score, 2-1, to avoid elimination and force a Game 6.
snippet: After tying the game with less than two minutes left in regulation, the Rangers won in overtime by a familiar score, 2-1, to avoid elimination and force a Game 6.
